title: Haiti quake leaves small businesses in ruins, compounding woes - Reuters
content:
LES CAYES, Aug 18 (Reuters) - Days before a powerful earthquake struck, Rosemond Clermont paid the $1,554 rent on the office of his construction business in southern Haiti for the rest of the year.
… [+2308 chars]

content:
Posted
